thread.title_full: Antwerp Or évalué par Peter Jansens

author: Peter Jansens
title: Antwerp Or évalué par Peter Jansens
text: I bought my wife a pair of diamond earrings made of 18 carat rose gold as a surprise after 10 years of marriage and she loved it!! Came beautifully packaged, and looked just like on the website. The price I paid for what I got was phenomenal, and I have already recommended them to several of my friends.
